articles.title: Dick Cavett Dishes on Groucho Marx, Johnny Carson, and Donald Trump - The Daily Beast
articles.description: “There was that sense of…I’m trying to avoid using the word inferiority in his case.”
articles.content: I cant believe that hes here now, I cant believe I know Groucho Marx, I cant believe that there is a Groucho Marx, a young and sparkling Dick Cavett said in 1968 when introducing his comedic idol on … [+10793 chars]
